name: CaveFlame
description:
A horror game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46!

"Your friend has gone missing, and you visit where they were last seen. You notice a cave, and once you’re inside, you're stuck until morning."

Controls

Click to navigate through rooms.

Click and Hold to turn the Valve in the Water Room.

To enter the Paper Room, click on the door in the Water Room. To close it, click and hold on the lever on the wall.

Click on the stack of paper to collect papers for a maximum of 5 at a time.

To exit rooms, click on the bottom of the screen.

How to play

There are 4 rooms in the game: The Fire Room, the Pipe Room, the Water Room, and the Paper Room. If the fire goes out or you stay in the room with it for too long, you will die. Hit the pipe to scare it away if you see it, and use the door in the Water Room to lock it out. Make sure to constantly give the fire paper from the paper room, and make sure to keep the valve in the water room tightly shut, or else water will leak into the fire room.

Survive until morning to win.

Important Notes:

The audio in the web version might be a little weird. Luckily this doesn't happen in the downloadable versions.

I kinda had to rush this to publish it, so if there are any bugs, let me know! I'm planning to release a post-jam version later on.

Thank you for playing!
